More examplesFewer examples"After all," he points out, somewhat superfluously, "she's not an investment banker, and he's not a nuclear physicist.""Where's your cab?" "Out the front." He pointed superfluously to the big doors. I took it for granted that it was a superfluously ornamental camera. One reporter asked the player, a little superfluously, if he had come here to win.
